We securely hold and manage the keys to your property, providing trusted access for guests, maintenance, and emergencies. Your home is always in safe hands.

Our property checks follow a structured checklist to keep your home secure and well maintained while you are away.

Included in our property check

  • Collection of mail
  • Airing out the property
  • Watering of indoor plants
  • Flushing taps and toilets (spolning av kranar och toaletter)
  • Checking that all lighting is functioning
  • General inspection to identify potential damage or issues
